3_12a5bEEVXyvu1jer6JpujSPra1A21wKcQT.body: Keep it up, the last thing you want to do is use anything to cope. I don't want to pretend to know more than I do. So I really don't know the best way to approach someone with a substance abuse problem. I would seek professional consultation, tell them your situation. Let them tell you what is the best course of action. I wouldn't confront them head on though. I remember hearing that just leads to defensiveness and further conflict.
